评论详情: Was very impressed with the quality of this dress and it fit great.

I wanted to show the pictures but somehow it won't allow me to post pictures from my gallery 🤷. Anyways, I love the dress. Pros: The color is vibrant. The dress is not heavy. Cons: It's difficult to zip up and unzip, the zipper is of a bad quality and I'm worried it will break very quick. For this prize it should be much better. The dress is made for a taller woman then I am (5'3). I had to pull them to the shortest length there is. The dress is a bit stretchy which is good. In the chest area the lace is a bit too extended but it covers a bit of armpit, so, it's okay, even though looks strange. Maybe if I had bigger boobs it wouldn't be so noticable. Will I recommend it? Yes! I'm glad it came on time for a birthday party I'm invited to. And I'd recommend to buy a shrug either lace or sequined to cover shoulders and compliment the dress making it look like not just a summer dress but a cocktail party dress.

Bought this for a friend's wedding (after trying so many dresses) and  loved it.  I didn't think I would like the spaghetti straps, but they are adjustable and not too thin.  The dress was extremely comfortable and I received several compliments.  The common theme was that it was very ballerina-esque!  Even if it's not your usual style, give it a try!  Very happy that I did.
Fit ok but very flat hanging. Straps poor quality.

I am 5'5", 143 lbs., athletic build and I bought a large in the black dress and a medium in the green dress. the band that goes around your rib cage doesn't have much give. So on the green dress, it felt a bit snug there. The black dress was so comfortable and flowy in the larger size. I normally wear a medium in everything but I feel like the large was more comfortable. The straps are adjustable so that allows you to pull the dress up so it's not so low cut. It's a beautiful dress and the lace is soft. I will say, the straps aren't entirely very sturdy so I'd handle with care. I love this dress! Definitely a great buy!

Super comfy and cute! As someone who’s picky with dresses this one worked out well! I last minute had to find an outfit for a wedding and this dress came just in time and was easy to style. I got loads of compliments!! It fit perfectly and wasn’t itchy nor uncomfortable.
The quality wasn’t there for me and it came smelling like perfume. I was hoping that didn’t mean someone wore it and returned it and they resold it.
I lived the way it fit and the way it looked on me

评论概述: What a beautiful dress i got!
评论详情: What a formal wedding dress i got! I loved it.  It fits me well.  I wore it comfortably, confidently and beautifully the whole time of the occasion. Even my husband who opened the package (i was out when it arrived) admired the dress and called me just to tell me his admiration to the wedding dress. Will order more next time. More power. Thank you.

This dress looks more expensive than it is. It is really stretchy and comfortable. It was true to size. The only thing I didn’t like was the way the adjustable straps look. That part of the dress looks a little cheap. Wore my hair down and no one could see the straps.
The perfect dress! So stretchy and cozy. I am 5'6" 180 lbs and ordered the large, but a medium could have also worked. Quite flattering, if I do say so myself.
This dress came in and was ok for our purposes of wearing to homecoming for my small size daughter. The skirt part just hangs down so we bought a petticoat to go underneath.

I absolutely love this dress! Overall, it fits great, but the cut on the side of the chest does pop out a bit, which is the only issue I found. It doesn’t seem entirely true to size—I bought a medium, but it feels a little big, even though I'm carrying an extra 20+ lbs. I'm a C cup, and the side still opens up slightly, so keep that in mind when choosing your size. I'll definitely update with photos when I wear it. But overall, I’m excited to have found a casual, beautiful white dress that’s perfect for a white party. I didn’t want anything that looked like a wedding dress or something I couldn’t wear again, and this one fits the bill perfectly. The material feels like great quality. It’s super easy to put on since the chest and waist areas are nice and stretchable. So happy I found this one!
Dress has really bad quality - random threads sticking out, straps are very flimsy, and the bottom of the zipper sticks out and sits awkwardly
Would recommend
Got my normal size but it didn’t fit as snug as it should in chest and waist area. Also the pink is very dull and probably not flattering on many lighter tones of skin

I ordered the dark green in small and wore to an outdoor wedding.  Perfect fit and was able to wear a regular bra with it.  Zipped well and was able to adjust the straps.  Well made and material doesn’t look cheap.

I am 210 lbs, 8 months postpartum and breastfeeding. This was such a perfect dress to have for my besties wedding out in AZ in the middle of the summer. While it didn't have any tummy support for my mommy pooch, I cared more about the heat about was about to endure so the light weight fabric was great. There is no boning within the dress, so I used breast tape to lift and support the girls a bit. I bought an XL and it fit great.
Super soft material and very breathable; my bridesmaids are wearing these!
This is a beautiful dress. It fits comfortably. Not see through either.

Bought this to wear to a wedding. Color and cut looked nice. I was able to wear my everyday bra under it without it showing which was nice (38D). The stitching on the straps and around the chest area looked a little cheap but for the price it was fine for a one time wear. Not sure how long it would last after several wears and washes without pilling. I wore this on a very hot day and was fairly comfortable, but it was not the most breathable. Overall the dress was flattering and looked nice enough for the occasion.

This was such a wonderful surprise of quality on a budget!  The fabric, the vibrant color, the lace detail, the flattering fit…I loved it all!  I bought this for a Derby outfit but I would absolutely wear this dress for other occasions. And I’m so tempted to get more colors!
Great fit, feels well made. Very comfortable. I’m too pale for this color pink, it almost blends into me. Will be exchanging for another color if possible

Lovely, quality, true to size, as advertised, all round a great purchase! I bought this for my sister's wedding because it looked comfortable and easy to nurse in and I was not disappointed! Absolutely everything I was looking for!

评论用户: Disappointed in product! Sent back ! Straps too elastic and the fit on the dress was too big and I had ordered a small. I am 5:3 and 116 lbs so it should have fit!! The dress was very pretty in lilac but poor quality on the lace
评论详情: I ordered the dress for a wedding. It was pretty but poor quality on the lace.Zipper kept getting stuck. I returned it.Small was too big . I’m 5:3 and weigh 116 lbs.
I just reviewed the dress today and it so beautiful and light weight. The material is soft and stretchy which makes it comfortable to wear. I’m a size small, 128 lbs and 4’11”
LOVE this dress so much! Super comfy and flattering on body. Bought this in another color already!

评论概述: Great dress for middle school dance
评论详情: We got this for our daughter and she loves it.  Fits wonderfully and is super soft fabric.
I have to returned the dress looked cheap and the spaghetti looks and feels like an  old & worn out material
Ordered this dress for a cruise when it came in the straps were barely sewed on and the lace was all fringey. The fit was not flattering either.
One strap was sewn upside down and twisted. There arent any bra inserts so a bra much be worn with it
Definitely made well but I would size down since this runs large and is very bulky
Perfect bridesmaids dress
I wore this as a wedding guest and I got so many compliments on it! The cut is cute and the quality is great. An awesome Amazon find!
Loved the way it fit overall! Received lots of compliments !

The dress is good in quality and the color is bright yellow as pictured. I am usually a size medium but went for a large because I was afraid the fabric was not stretchy but it is. It did not look too loose but I think an M would have worked out just fine. It is a little see-through so, you be aware of this for your underwear choice.

I bought this dress for my wedding reception. I wasn’t expecting much but omg I loved this dress! It’s so soft and stretchy. Even the straps are stretchy. I am in love. The only thing I would change is the top part is a little see through. But it’s perfect overall.
This dress was completely see through.
I’m 155lbs and 5’2”, D cup and the dress was flattering and comfortable. Quite a few compliments
Love this dress.Going to wear it on Saturday for a b-day party.Glad I purchased it.Nice fit,lovely material.
I loved it. Beautiful, good fabric and quality.

评论概述: Larger bra cup sizes might not be happy
评论详情: I’m a 34F, 135 lbs, 5’4”,  and while this dress is pretty, comfortable, and well-lined, it was *really* unflattering to my girls. Something about the design of the top of the dress just made them look much larger and low-hanging despite the excellent bra I wore. I had to buy a dress at the last minute, and I didn’t have time to get something new when it was clear it didn’t look good on me. I’m normally proud of my girls, but I felt self-conscious the whole evening. I wouldn’t recommend it for larger cup size wearers.
I had to send it back

This dress was so much more comfortable then I thought it would be. The lace is soft, the fit is flattering. The length is a little too long for my height/leg shape but overall I loved it and would purchase more. I’m almost 5’6 about 115-120 and I ordered a small and I didn’t even have to unzip it to get it on and off, but it still managed to look like it fit.
Color was unique and it was very comfortable
Received quickly and is very nice as I hear as was gift
I got so many compliments!!! Fit amazing!!
Fabulous material and looks great on. Ordered a small- 125 lb 5’7”; 34 bust and 27/28 waist. Thought about going to medium- glad I didn’t. Great buy!!
It fit a little above the knee and has adjustable straps for a perfect fit. Love this dress; super flattering. Would still wear with nude bike shorts/spanx/spandex underneath.

评论概述: Zipper broke after 5 hours of wear
评论详情: I wore this dress once. It wasn't tight at all. I did size up. But the zipper broke.

I’ve been searching and trying various dresses for a summer wedding weekend and I’m so glad I stumbled on this! It’s light and stretchy and you can dress it up or down with jewelry and accessories. The other reviews about the straps not offering support are true. Lois great with a strapless bra. I got the dress in brown and I’ll probably get another color!
Dress fits and looks nice. Cheaply made. Would have had to glue down the ruffles by the strap as they didn’t lay right, but then noticed the big hole under the arm pit.
Le quedó hermoso a mi hija
Wore this dress to an acquaintance's wedding. I liked the color, and stretchiness and thought it looked flattering on me.
Loved this dress but it was a bit longer than I expected. Super cute just not right for the occasion needed. Also, it is really stretchy so it runs a bit big.
Great
Beautiful dress!  Definitely better quality than I was expecting.
I wore the pretty blush pink to my wedding dress appointment. Love the lace, the length, & the feel of this dress! I may purchase another in a different color!
It was very pretty dress and fit perfectly . My daughter loved it but she did end up choosing a different dress for fall formal.

I got this dress in green and wore it to a wedding and got so many compliments on it. Everyone I talked to kept asking me where it was from. It’s also a very soft material and has great stretch to it, so it was really comfortable for dancing. I’m normally a size small, so I ordered this dress in both a size small and medium to be safe, and the small fit perfectly, so I’d say to order your normal size.
If I hadn't missed the return window I would I have sent it back. The fit is really unflattering. The layer underneath kept riding up. The bust was uneven. Will not be wearing this.

Beautiful except for the three inch tear in the seam in the side of the chest under the arm. Unfortunately I noticed this while putting it on for the first time an HOUR BEFORE THE WEDDING I WAS ATTENDING IN A FOREIGN COUNTRY. I had bo option but to use nail glue I luckily had to keep the seam from ripping further and completely coming undone during the wedding. Ultimately a pretty dress but poor quality control.
Very cute dress.

I did not get this outfit. Dress looks pretty, the things that i noticed was the dress is little heavy or has a weight than the straps. Straps is elastic (i believed), it does not hold the weight of the dress, so i need to pull back or adjust it since I don’t like to show more chest in the wedding event.

评论概述: Beautiful blue dress; straps are too stretchy.
评论详情: I love the style, fit, fabric, and length of the dress. It’s exactly what I wanted and as described. However, the only change I would make would be a less stretchy strap choice. It’s very stretchy and will slip loose very easily. I’ll just throw a few stitches on them to hold them in place.

I ordered this dress as an alternative to a much more expensive dress for a wedding and while it isn't exact, it is very close and so comfortable. The material is silky smooth (not itchy at all) and very flattering. The straps are very thin and they are stretchy as well so if you are bigger busted(Beware) you may have to have them reinforced and the zipper isn't fantastic but I haven't had any problems so far.
Loved this dress! It was a little longer than I expected but it was still a good length

I LOVE this dress!  I wore it to a wedding and received multiple compliments on it!  The dress is super comfortable too!  I Purchased it in burgundy, size small and it fit perfect!  I am 5’2 petite frame for reference.

评论概述: Beautiful and comfortable dress - very flattering!
评论详情: Absolutely love this dress! I actually ordered dark green first And loved the look and fit so much that I also ordered black! I typically wear a size large so to me this is very true to size . I’m 5’4 and wish it was a little shorter but that’s just personal  preference . It’s very very comfy and flattering . I love that the straps are adjustable as I’m very small chested and this helps it fit much better so it doesn’t look or feel that I’m not fitting into the bust. Wish it was a little cheaper priced but love it anyway !

This dress is super comfortable and flattering. I am pear shaped and this works well for me but I think it would work on any body type. I am using it for a day wedding and I think it will be perfect for the occasion; not too fancy but just enough. The straps could be a little sturdier. It feels good on but I didn’t trust them enough to actually hang the dress on them because I wasn’t sure they could handle the weight of the dress on a hanger. But overall, very happy with the purchase and looking forward to wearing it.
Fits nicely, modest in length but flattering otherwise.  Color as expected.  More comfortable than I expected - nice stretch, no need for a bra due to the lace pattern (in my opinion, at least!)

I ordered a medium and the dress was a little bigger than expected. I usually wear a size 8/10 so I thought id better be safe based on previous reviews. However, the dress has a lot of stretchiness to it and for a more fitted look I wish I would have gone with the small. All and all it was a beautiful affordable dress for an outdoor wedding.
Got a few compliments & felt comfy & confident in the dress. Curvy & short the medium fit well.
I wore to a wedding and it was great
This is a quality dress and very beautiful!! I purchased it to wear as my wedding after party .

This dress was amazing. My husband and I eloped for our wedding and I wanted something summery, since I live in Florida. It is very lightweight, if you wear a white bra and underwear it's not see through, very flowy fit amazing I would highly recommend this dress!

When my dress arrived and trying it on, I was in awe of how well it fit. It actually fits better than the one I ordered from a well known high end store. I ordered this dress to pack for vacation and I must say that I’m so excited to sport it with my perfect jewelry to match. Seller, you did an amazing job with this one👍🏽👏🏽💃🏽

Loved this as my wedding dress on a 95 degree day! I got a lot of compliments on it, and it was very comfortable. I felt great in it. It is a smidge see-through, but I wore nude colored shapewear under it on my bottom half so you couldn’t tell. My white strapless bra was visible, but luckily it actually kind of blended into the design and looked like it was part of the dress. True to size for me, perfect fit!

Beautiful color and good quality. XL got great. I am 5’7” and length hit just below the knees. Only draw back is the straps give zero support. They are more like just pieces of elastic. With a good strapless bra it was fine.
Dress was well made, Beautiful, fit well and the stretch it has is a plus for comfort.  Recieved many compliments.
Beautiful dress, made well, looks beautiful.  Great price !

评论概述: There Burgundy and There is RED
评论详情: I absolutely LOVED how this dress fit and made me feel when I tried it on BUT it is being returned and I now have to order another color and hope it gets here on time :(((. The color on the site says burgundy and the dress looks lighter in color, but it is RED. Red is not acceptable to wear to a wedding generally and that is what I need this for. Let’s hope the black or dark green works!  I have an athletic fit, with thick thighs and a butt haha, and I ordered a Medium for reference. Dress hits right below my knees I want to cover up
This dress is pretty, the fabric is nice. However the straps are weak and if you have any boobs whatsoever, order at least one size up. This fit perfect in the waist, but couldn’t zip past my boobs.

评论概述: Love the style and fit. Perfect to wear to an evening party or wedding.
评论详情: Cute dress! Bigger than I had expected it to fit. Nice length. Love the lace.

This dress is fabulous! Soft, stretchy lace. Well made. Flattering cut. Almost didn't buy it because of some reviews about the straps breaking but I got a tiny sewing kit if that's ever an issue (and I don't sew - Straps are a very easy fix 😉). Super glad I went with this because I tried 4 other dresses for the occasion, and this was the winner. Super comfy, wish there were more colors

评论概述: Good but definitely could be better
评论详情: I loved the dress. Literally was amazing. However the lace gets caught in everything and you have to be super careful. I also had one of the straps almost rip off because it wasn’t sewn on very well. I fixed it with some string. Definitely expected a little better quality but it was a really nice flattering dress!
Love this dress! Fits perfectly and the color is amazing
Too big

I loved how comfortable this dress was. The straps are adjustable which I liked. The length is not too short, not too long. I felt comfortable in the dress for hours and late into the night at a wedding. Very flattering.
Straps were very stretchy which made it look cheap and unflattering in person. The body of the dress was cheap material but cute in person

I wore this dress for my rehearsal dinner with a Jean jacket over top (not pictured) and I love it so much! (I love it without the Jean jacket too! 😅) It's not only soft, but its not too thin, but also not too thick. It's seriously the perfect material, and perfect fit. 💙
Great dress that can be dressed up or down. It’s not super tight but still provides curves.

评论概述: Fits pretty well, straps not great quality
评论详情: Bought this dress for a semi-formal wedding I was attending, and enjoyed wearing it! I am quite petite at 5ft, 90lbs. I would say overall it was slightly big but fit comfortably, I just would’ve liked it to be a bit tighter. My main complaint as others mentioned are that the straps are not high quality and I had to re-adjust a bit throughout the night as the straps untightened minimally. They just did not look quite as nice as the rest of the dress.
Wore to a wedding and received lots of compliments. So comfortable too.

评论概述: Cute but runs a bit big
评论详情: I bought a size large and probably could have gotten away with a medium as it wasn’t tight at all. I just prefer things a little tighter. Dress was not see-through and i got lots of compliments on it. Straps are thin and seem weak but they didn’t break on me yet!

评论概述: Very flattering dress! Looks just like the pictures!
评论详情: I'm 5'10 & 144 pounds, with an hourglass body. This dress was super flattering, very stretchy, and the material did not look/feel cheap. The length was perfect for a tall woman like myself! I am wearing this to a bridal shower, and I think it's perfect for a daytime event.
Ordered a M - Could have went with a S - Runs larger than a M

Wore this dress to my friend’s wedding and was surprised how comfortable it was.  Not sheer or too short.  Liked that it was below knee length and did not weigh a lot.  Only thing I didn’t like was that it was kind of loose up top on the straps, but I wore a cardigan to cover it.
So comfortable! Great for a wedding
The stretch was perfect where I could have gotten a small but the fit was still perfect. Flattering and covered my mommy belly! N
